entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -14.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 10:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -14.6°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.9°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 60 gusting to 90 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
